metaTags.metaTitle: GigaOm Radar Report for DNS Security
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader and and categorized as a Fast Mover in the 2023 GigaOm Radar Report for DNS Security. The report evaluated eight different vendors and Cloudflare was ranked as a leader. Access the full report to learn why.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare named a Leader and Fast Mover in the 2023 GigaOm Radar for DNS Security
relatedBlades.copy:
<style>
  .grid__item--third {
  vertical-align: top;
    margin-bottom: auto;
  }
  </style>

Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader and Fast Mover in the 2023 GigaOm Radar for DNS Security. The report evaluated eight different vendors across a series of concentric rings, with those set closer to the center judged to be of higher overall value.

Cloudflare's DNS Security solutions help organizations mitigate attacks across the full DNS threat spectrum. They are built on Cloudflare's %{NetworkCapacityV2} of total network capacity â€” many times larger than the largest-ever DNS DDoS attack and blocks DDoS attacks in addition to other attack varieties.

Read the report to:

- Understand the current DNS landscape
- Learn about the most pressing and relevant DNS Security capabilities across eight different vendors
- Discover why Cloudflare is recognized as a DNS Security services Leader

![2023 GigaOm Radar for DNS Security - image](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/4WoStbaWlgRdEWDfBXW8yX/ac35c909b23ca2f55d18ab7b52b46aa3/dns-security-23.622-2_radar-chart_v22.05.19-1.png)
